analysis.description: Standard223Token.isContract (/unique_chucks/9/0xdfbd2889bdba743d3454911df61d200e79294b01.sol#309-313) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/9/0xdfbd2889bdba743d3454911df61d200e79294b01.sol:
	Contract ICOToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0xdfbd2889bdba743d3454911df61d200e79294b01.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
